name: @braintree/browser-detection
description: A small lib to detect browser compatibility for braintree products

scripts.preplaywright: npm run build && rm dist/browser-detection.bundle.js && npx browserify dist/browser-detection.js -o dist/browser-detection.bundle.js --standalone browserDetection
scripts.playwright: npx playwright test --config=src/__tests__/playwright/playwright.browserstack.config.ts && npm run playwright:android
scripts.playwright:local: npm run preplaywright && npx playwright test --config=src/__tests__/playwright/playwright.local.ts && npm run postplaywright
scripts.playwright:local:headed: npm run preplaywright && npx playwright test --config=src/__tests__/playwright/playwright.local.ts --headed && npm run postplaywright
scripts.playwright:android: npm run preplaywright && cd src/__tests__/playwright/__tests__/android && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=./playwright.browserstack.config.ts && npm run postplaywright
scripts.playwright:ipad: npx playwright test --config=src/__tests__/playwright/playwright.browserstack.config.ts --project=ipad && npm run postplaywright
scripts.playwright:ios: npx playwright test --config=src/__tests__/playwright/playwright.browserstack.config.ts --project=ios && npm run postplaywright
scripts.playwright:osx: npx playwright test --config=src/__tests__/playwright/playwright.browserstack.config.ts --project=osx && npm run postplaywright
scripts.playwright:windows: npx playwright test --config=src/__tests__/playwright/playwright.browserstack.config.ts --project=windows && npm run postplaywright

author: Braintree <code@getbraintree.com>
